channel.title: Making a logo
channel.description:
Alright, I know I haven't been on in a while but I wanted to have someone help me make a logo.. like a moving gif image I don't want to use microsoft GIF animator because it makes the pictures move to fast.. or is there a way to slow it down? Umm anway I wanted to make a logo for my site ok here the pic..
[IMG]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x303/mystickid2k6/RSQnewlogo_1.jpg[/img]
I wanted the "Rune" part to fly in from the top left, the "Scape" part to fly in from the bottom right, and the sword to fly in from the bottom left then have it look like it like normal pic but with full rs logo when finished...

item.title: Making a logo
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

Alright, I know I haven’t been on in a while but I wanted to have someone help me make a logo… like a moving gif image I don’t want to use microsoft GIF animator because it makes the pictures move to fast… or is there a way to slow it down?
